name: Parallel Threat
description:
So you're sleeping and has an odd dream...

It's all black and white, and there are monsters trying to invade your world through your dreams.

Like in any good nightmare, you are powerless and have to stop them all just throwing...Rocks? 

Kill 'em all and do your best to survive as long as you can...your world depends on it!

This game was made in 7 days to HigPixel Game Jam!

https://itch.io/jam/highpixel-gamejam
